name: Argonne Elementary School ExCEL Program
description: LOCATION: Argonne Elementary School - 680 18th Avenue, San Francisco, CA 94121 The YMCA at Argonne is an afterschool program for K-3rd graders that believes in the importance of Youth Development. MORE INFORMATION We are passionate about helping children realize their potential. At the YMCA Afterschool program, we are intentional about fostering Achievement, Relationships and Belonging. We incorporate a holistic approach to develop youth academically and emotionally. Youth have fun while engagin
